FATOU B. B. is a 46 year-old woman. She is married and a mother of four children. She is a member of the village branch of SINTH MALEME DENTAL group since June 17, 2009. She has benefited from three previous loans and has always repaid them punctually.

She has a small business of thioub fabrics. She also sells breakfast.

With her new credit, she is going to buy "thioub" fabrics to retail, and purchase a supply of milk, butter, eggs, etc. to sell breakfast.

Her objective is to strengthen her activity and to increase her benefits to provide for her personal needs and take part in the support of her family.

loans.use: to purchase thioub fabrics and aliments to sell breakfast

loans.name: Mrs. Pha Village Bank Group

texts.en:
This village bank loan consists of fifteen people who will each use their portion of the loan for different purposes to improve their families' standard of living. Mrs. Pha is the village bank president who has been selected by the other members. She was born in 1959. She owns a general store in the local village where she can sell groceries to earn some income to support her family. She is a widow with a child who is a seamstress in a garment factory. 

Since her grocery business is getting on well, she wants to expand it. So Mrs. Pha is finding for a loan to bU. more groceries. With the rest of the loan she is going to bU. some piglets for breeding to start a new business.

loans.use: To buy more groceries for resale.

loans.name: Samier

texts.ar: سمير متزوج عمره 44 سنة وله ولدان يعمل في بناء وتركيب الجفصين والأسقف المستعارة له في عمله 13 سنة يحب عمله ويبدع فيه كثيرا فهو عمل ابتكاري ويتميز بالجمال والدقة في العمل له زبائن كثر من محيطه والضيع المجاورة والمهندسين يوجد لديه بعض المصاعب المادية التي تعيق تطور عمله حيث انه مجتهد ومكب على العمل بشكل كبير يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء بضاعة للعمل جفصين واسقف مستعارة حتى يزيد من الطلب على عمله ويحسن من مدخوله الشهري وتعليم ومساعدة الأهل في نفس الوقت فهو محب لعائلته واقاربه ويريد مساعدة من حوله ووضعهم في ظرف مادي واجتماعي جيد
texts.en: Samier is 44 years old and married with two children. He works installing hanging ceilings, and he has 13 years of experience in this line of work. He likes his work. He is innovative and inventive in his work, and he stands out in his field due to his attention to detail and due to the beauty of his business's craftsmanship. He has many customers from his own community, from surrounding towns and from architects. He is currently facing some material difficulties which are hindering him from developing his business, even though he puts a lot of effort into his work and he is diligent in his work. With a loan from al-Majmoua, Samier would like to buy supplies for his ceiling and ceiling lighting business so that he can increase his clientele and, in turn, his monthly income. With his increased income, he would like to contribute towards his family's education and their general well-being. He loves his family and his relatives very much, and he would like to help those around him to them all in good financial and social circumstances.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his business of installing hanging ceilings.

loans.name: Patience

texts.en:
Patience is 26 years old and lives in the town of West Point. She is single and has two children; one lives with her and the other with his grandmother in Ghana. She was not able to attend school but now both of her children are currently attending school. 

Patience has a business selling water and soft drinks in the Waterside market, which she has had for one year. She started with her own money and with the hot weather in Monrovia she says drinks are easy to sell. Patience has requested a loan to purchase more soft drinks and water. 

In the future, Patience hopes to be a prominent business-woman and have her own store.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks and water

loans.name: Mrs. Mom Village Bank Group

texts.en:
This village bank loan consists of nineteen members who will each use their portion of the loan for different purposes to improve their families' standard of living.

 Mrs. Mom is the village bank president who has been selected by the other members. She was born in 1980. She is a mother of five children, four of whom are attending local public school, and the youngest one is a 3-year-old. She is a farmer who owns a small piece of land where she can grow rice. She sells part of the rice and with the rest of the rice she supports her family, while her husband, Mr. Chek, is a fisherman and a cow middleman.

 Since her husband’s business is good, she wants to help him expand it. So Mrs. Mom is seeking a loan to add to her savings to buy more cows for resale.

loans.use: To buy more cows for resale.

loans.name: Noelly

texts.fr: Elle est mariée à un conducteur /revendeur  et a 02 enfants en charge. Agée de 39ans, madame Noelly  a démarré son activité en 1995 par la vente de charbon de bois et de chauffage. Elle fait son approvisionnement  à l’intérieur du pays et revend dans son domicile à Agbata. Noelly est une femme vaillante, elle a des ambitions, désire voir ses 02enfants grandir dans de bonnes conditions, aider son mari, s’épanouir c’est pour cela elle sollicite ce premier prêt pour l’achat de charbon de bois et de chauffage  pour réaliser d’énormes bénéfices.
texts.en: Mrs. Noelly is married to a driving salesman and has two dependent children. She is a 39 year-old woman who started her activity in 1995 by selling charcoal and firewood. She procures her stock inland and resells in her home in Agbata. Noelly is a valiant woman with ambitions; she wishes to see her two children grow up in good conditions, to help her husband, and to thrive. These are the reasons for which she is requesting this first loan to purchase charcoal and firewood so she can make large profits.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal and firewood

loans.name: Adham

texts.ar: ادهم عمره 19 سنة اعزب يعمل في بيع الأحذية والجزادين له في العمل سنتين يحب عمله كثيرا وخاصة انه في منطقة تمتلىء بالسواح في فصل الصيف يسعى الى تطوير نفسه وعمله فهو نشيط يتميز بالدقة في العمل والنشاط والاسعار المخفضة يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء بضاعة جديدة للعمل وتوسيع وتغيير الديكور في المحل خاصة قبل فصل الصيف حيث يمكن ان يتحسن مدخوله في فصل السواح التي تقصد هذه المنطقة يمتلك بضاعة ممتازة وهذا ايضا من ميزاته لا ينقصه حتى يتطور ويزيد من مدخوله هو فقط المادة لأنه يعمل في محيط تنافسي ويسعى الى التمييز في البضاعة والديكور في المحل
texts.en: Adham is a 19 year old bachelor. He works selling shoes and handbags and has been doing this for 2 years. He loves his business a lot, especially since it is located in an area where there are many tourists in summer. He aspires to develop himself and his shop as he is enthusiastic and known for his good customer service and low prices. With this loan he wants to purchase new stock and expand and renovate his shop before the summer season as the area attracts many tourists. His stock is of excellent quality and this is also a quality that also distinguishes him. There is nothing preventing him from developing and increasing his income except lack of financiA. capitA.. Since he works in a competitive area he wants to distinguish himself with his unique stock and shop décor.

loans.use: to purchase new stock and renovate his shop ahead of the tourist season

loans.name: Mrs. Chreang Village Bank Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Chreang is the village bank president who has been selected by the thirteen members who make up this village bank loan.  The members will use their portion of this loan for different purposes to improve their family's living. 

Mrs. Chreang was born in 1959. She is a farmer who owns a 2-hectare plot of land where she grows rice and vegetables to sell to earn money to support her family.  To improve her crops, Mrs. Chreang is asking for a loan to buy what she needs to do farming this current year. Her husband, Mr. Sam, is a government worker. Through these activities they support four children, three of whom are working as laborers, and the last one is studying in the local public school.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for farming

loans.name: Amelia

texts.en:
Amelia is 35 years old and lives in the town of West Point. She is not married but lives with her boyfriend and has 4 children. She was not able to attend school herself, but all her children are currently in school. Her partner works as a teacher. 

Amelia has a business selling soap, toothpaste, toothbrushes, and other small products, which she has had for 5 years. Some days the business is good and some others it's very slow. She started the business when her brother gave her some money. Now she is proud to support herself and her children.  

Amelia has requested a loan to purchase toothpaste, toothbrushes, and soap. In the future, Amelia hopes to build a house. She wants to be in good health so she can pay back the money and keep supporting her children.

loans.use: to purchase toothpaste, toothbrushes, and soap

loans.name: Fadela

texts.en:
Fadela is a 52-year-old widow and the mother to two children. She has worked at selling clothes since 2008 to keep herself and her children living after her husband's death. She describes life as harsh, because she has to struggle for living and providing the best she can for her children when there's no one to turn to or rely on.

She owns a small business, and wants to improve it through a second loan she requested from Al Majmoua. Her previous loan was effective and helped a lot in improving her social and financial situation. With this loan she plans to buy a new spring/summer clothes collection, in addition to starting a new business for her son. She wants to help him to open his own bakery and hopes he succeeds and helps her with their income and providing their needs. 

Fadela hopes to open a real shop one day, unlike the small table she uses now to put her merchandise on.

loans.use: to buy a new clothes collection to resell

loans.name: Akoessiwa Cécile

texts.fr: Cécile est mariée à un conducteur de taxi-moto et a 03 enfants en charge. Elle à 34ans et est revendeuse d’habits d’enfants. Il ya de cela 20ans qu’elle a commencé son activité, elle achète  à Lomé et revend au marché d’Agbata (une localité située à 12 km de Lomé).  Elle sollicite ce premier prêt pour acheter des habits pour vendre pour avoir de bénéfice afin d’aider son mari dans les charges du foyer, d’assurer  un bon avenir à ses enfants.
texts.en:
Cecile is married to a taxi-motor bike driver,  and has three children under her care. She is 34 and resells children's clothing.

She has been doing this activity for twenty years. 

She buys in Lome and resells at the market of Agbata, a locality 12 km (8 miles) from Lome. 

She requests this first loan to buy clothes to resell for profit, in order to help her husband in the household economy, and to ensure a good future her children.

loans.use: To buy children's clothing

loans.name: Mrs. Vuthy Village Bank Group

texts.en:
The ten people who make up this a village bank loan will use their portion of the loan for different purposes to improve their families' living.  Mrs. Vuthy is the village bank president who has been selected by the other members. 

Mrs. Vuthy was born in 1982. She is a duck breeder and her husband, Mr. Vai, is a driver who receives a low salary.  He is also a farmer who owns a small piece of land where he grows rice to sell as well as to feed his family.  Since Mrs. Vuthy's business is going well, she wants to expand.  To achieve her purpose, she is seeking a loan to buy more ducks as well as piglets and pig food to start a new business. 

Mrs. Vuthy is a mother of one child who is still too young to work or study.

loans.use: To buy more ducks and pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase seeds for his farm

loans.name: Magbel

texts.en:
Magbel is 37 years old and lives in the town of West Point. She is married and her husband works in a paint store. Magbel has three children: 21, 15 and 3. Two live with her and the other lives with her brother; the two oldest attend school. 

For four years, Magbel has been selling food: she cooks fufu (starchy dumplings), rice, and soup. Somedays the business is good, other days it's not. She learned how to cook from her mother and the best part of her work is that she likes cooking. 

Magbel has requested a loan to purchase bags of rice, fufu, and a large can of oil. In the future, Magbel would like to have her own restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase rice, fufu, and oil

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 50 years old, married and has four children.

In 2005 Ali opened his own shop selling household items and furniture; he has a long experience in this field and has a good reputation and he is well known in his area.

 He is requesting a $2700 loan to build a sliding door and metal shelves for his store. He is aiming to raise his capital so he can earn more profits and be able to improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: To build a sliding door and metal shelves.

loans.name: Rabih

texts.ar: ربيع طبيب يعمل في مهنته هذه اكثر من 15 سنة متزوج وعمره 64 سنة له 3 اولاد يتميز بحبه لهذه المهنة له عيادة خاصة به لكنها في منطقة في ضيعته حتى يخدم بها اهل ضيعته يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء ماكنة لتبييض الاسنان من الخارج فهو طموح ويحب ملاحقة التطور في العمل وشراء المعدات الجديدة حتى يقدم من خلالها الخدمات لأهل منطقته وضيعته له زبائن ايضا من محيطه ومن الخارج يتميز عمله بالنظافة والدقة والجدير بالذكر انه يمتلك خبرة واسعة في هذه المجال وهذا ما يميز عمله يحلم بأن يقيم مركز طبي كبير في ضيعته ليخدم من خلاله اهل ضيعته وخاصة الفقراء منهم
texts.en: Rabih is a 64 year old dentist. He is married with three children. He loves his work and owns a private clinic in his neighbourhood where he serves his neighbours. He wants a loan to buy tooth- whitening   equipment from abroad. Rabih wants to get state- of – the art equipment to keep abreast with the latest in his work and to better serve his neighbourhood. He has many customers from his neighbours and those who know him. He is known for his exhaustive experience and professionalism. Rabih wishes to open a large medical centre to serve all people in his neighbourhood, especially the poor.

loans.use: to buy tooth-whitening equipment for his dental clinic

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia  is 42 years old and lives in the town of West Point. She is married and has two children, 20 and 18. They live at home with her and both are attending school. She has a business selling drinks with the neighborhood association of Clara Town, it's named United Africano Kool Aid and you can see it advertised on her t-shirt. She learned how to prepare several kinds of drinks through a friend and by now she has been in the business for 10 years. Sometimes business is good and other days it is very slow. 

Cecelia requested a loan to purchase milk, sugar and plastic cups. In the future, Cecelia would like to purchase a freezer to sell cold drinks.

loans.use: to purchase milk, sugar, and plastic cups

loans.name: Dinara's Group

texts.en:
Dinara O. is the leader of this group. She is 46 and is married to an engineer.  Together with her husband she has raised two sons and a daughter.  Both sons are farmers and the daughter is studying at school. 

In order to earn additional money to meet the family needs, Dinara breeds livestock and then resells them at a higher price. In this way, she earns additional 4000 soms per month. That profit made it possible for her to improve her family's living conditions and purchase household appliances. 

With the money received from the loan, Dinara would purchase more livestock. In the near future, she plans to start repairing their house.

--- Where Did This Loan Come From? ---

This loan is brought to you by Mol Bulak Finance (MBF), a young, ambitious and socially-focused Microfinance Institution in Kyrgyzstan. 
MBF is strongly committed to the principles of sustainable development and upholds the triple bottom line – People (building human capital and taking care of its customers as well as society), Planet (keeping environmentally friendly) and Profit (earning revenue to expand autonomously). MBF is the only Microfinance Institute in Kyrgyzstan that delivers its services to customers 365 days a year. To learn more about MBF and view a Video presentation about the organization, please visit: http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=135 
If you would like to support and learn more about Kyrgyzstan and microfinance in Central Asia, please join our Lending Team - Supporters of Kyrgyzstan – Mol Bulak Finance at http://kiva.org/team/kyrgyzstan. Members will get special updates and news from Kiva Fellows in Kyrgyzstan and from the MBF staff.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Mustapha

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 35 years old, married and has three children.

In 2008, Mustapha opened a food market; he sells all kinds of foodstuffs and herbs used to prepare alternative medicines. He has two years of experience. He has an excellent reputation and he is becoming well known in his area.

He is requesting a $1500 loan to repair his shop and to expand his inventory. He is aiming to develop his business and to offer the best services for customers and to grow bigger so he will be able to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To repair his shop and to expand the inventory.

loans.name: Safaa

texts.en:
Safaa is a 30-year-old married woman, living with her husband and five children in Dahieh. She helps her husband with their family's income and expenses, because children request a lot of care and have needs to provide for. 

Safaa started working in 2006. She works at her house as a hairdresser and makeup artist. She is willing to start selling cosmetics, and that's why she requested a loan from A. Majmoua this time. Her previous loan was to buy new machines and tools for her business, and that eased her work a lot. Her customers can afford her prices and she's going to trade with requested materials so that she won't be stuck with merchandise that is hard to sell. She is also going to buy a bed and an oven she really needs.

She hopes to expand her business and open a small beauty salon outside her house. She said that she hopes one day she can save enough money to take this step.

loans.use: to buy new cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Helena

texts.en:
Helena  is 35 years old and lives in the town of West Point. She is married and has two children that are 14 and 3. She was able to attend school up to 11th grade herself, and her oldest is attending school. Her husband has his own business. 

Helena has been selling coal in her community for 5 years. She sells the coal in large sacks and likes talking to her customers but says it's difficult to get the sacks back from them which results in more expenses. 

Helena requested a loan to purchase more coal. In the future she wants to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more coal

loans.name: Basem

texts.ar: باسم عمره 30 سنة يعمل في صالون للحلاقة رجالي له في عمله 9 سنوات اعزب يحب عمله يسعى دائما الى زيادة مدخوله وتحسين وضعه المادي والاجتماعي باسم يساعد اهله في تحسين وضعهم المادي فهو يسعى دائما الى توثيق الروابط الأسرية يتميز بالعمل الجيد والمبتكر كان للقرض السابق الأثر الجيد على عمله وتحسين وضع محله يتميز محله بنقطة مميزة فهو قريب من جميع الضيع المجاورة يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء بضاعة للمحل من شامبو وزيوت للشعر وماكنة ماساج حتى يواكب تطور العمل وينتقل بعمله من مرحلة التقليد الى الابتكار في العمل
texts.en: Basem, 30, has been working at a barber shop for 9 years. He has a passion for his work. Basem wishes to increase his income and to raise his standard of living. Basem helps his family and always seeks to strengthen his relationship with them. His previous loan had a positive impact on his work. His shop has a great location in his neighbourhood. Basem wants a loan to buy stock for his shop, like shampoo, hair oil, and massage equipment, so as to keep abreast with the latest styles in his job and turn from imitation to innovation.

loans.use: To buy stock for his barber shop

loans.name: Mama

texts.en:
Mama is 49 years old and lives in the town of West Point. She lives with her partner who has his own business and has three children aged 27, 18 and 7. All three live at home with her -- the oldest works and the other two are attending school. 

For 10 years Mama has been cooking food and selling donuts at the Waterside Market. Sometimes she doesn't have enough money to buy her ingredients wholesale and has to buy retail, which is much more expensive. She likes to talk with her customers and learned how to cook from her auntie a long time ago. 

Mama has requested a loan to buy flour, oil, sugar, yeast and baking powder. In the future, she would like to have her own place at the market and build a house for her and her children.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, sugar, yeast and baking powder

loans.name: Namig

texts.ru: Namig A. 37 let. On jenat i imeyet odnoqo rebonka  seychas projivayet v qorode Baku vmeste so svoyey lubimoy semyoy. Namig uje 4 qoda kak imeyet svayo kafe qde samje i rabotayet povorom, on qotovit razniye Shashliki iz kurinnoqo myaso, iz myaso baranini, iz ribi i t.d. Namiq seychas nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit i ustroit vixlopnuyu trubu, vitajku.
texts.en: Namiq A. is 37 years old. He is married and has one child. He currently lives   in the city of Baku with his beloved family. For the past years, he has been keeping his own café, in which he also works as a chef. He prepares different types of “shashlik” (shish kebab), with chicken, lamb, fish, etc. At present he needs 200 AZN in order to buy and install ventillation equipment.

loans.use: to purchase ventillation equipment

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is 27 years old and lives in the town of West Point. She lives with her boyfriend who cuts hair. Beatrice has three children, 12, 6, and 4 -- all are living with her.  Her two oldest children attend school. 

For seven years Beatrice has been cooking and selling pig feet. She started out selling food by the bowl and then later switched to pig feet. Recently, the price of pig feet went up and that has been a challenge for her. Regarding being in business, Beatrice likes to earn her own money and also says that people respect her. 

Beatrice has requested a loan to buy a barrel of pig feet to cook and sell. In the future she would like to buy her own land and build a house.

loans.use: to buy a barrel of pig feet to cook and sell

loans.name: Nizar

texts.ar: نزار عمره 34 سنة اعزب يعمل في محل لبيع الهواتف النقالة والاكسسوارت وغيره له في عمله 7 سنوات يحب عمله ويتميز به في محيطه يسعى نزار الى تحسين الوضع المادي والاجتماعي ويريد بناء عائلة ومساعدة الاهل على تحسين الوضع المادي والاجتماعي يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء بضاعة اكسسوارت للهواتف النقالة و خطوط تعبئة له زبائن من جيرانه واقاربه يتميز بابتكاره وتصليح الموبيلات الجديدة على الماسحة الضوئية (scan) يريد دائما مساعدة الاهل حتى يمكن العلاقة الاسرية بينه وبين اهله وان يبني اسرة تكون على اساس جيد ومادي متوسط
texts.en: Nizar is a 34 year old bachelor. He has been working for seven years at a shop for selling mobile handsets and mobile phone accessories. Nizar has a passion for his work. He seeks to improve his sociA. and financiA. conditions. He wants to have a family and to improve his parents' living conditions. Nizar wants a loan from A. Majmoua to buy new mobile sets accessories and pre- paid lines to sell in the shop. His clients are mainly from his neighbours and relatives. He is innovative and he fixes mobile handsets using scanners. He wants to help his parents and to build a good family with a reasonable income.

loans.use: To buy mobile handsets and mobile phone accessories to sell in his shop

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase equipment and expand his barber shop

loans.name: Harun Odhiambo

texts.en:
Harun O. is 26 years old.  He is married to Grace, who is a housewife. They have two children who are in nursery school. Harun and his family live in the Usenge area.

Harun has a phone accessories business that he has been running for the past two years. He is in need of new stock which consists of phone batteries, chargers and SIM cards. He has applied for his second loan from KADET LTD to buy more stock. He will use the profits made to cater to his family's needs since his wife does not have any source of income.

Harun hopes to see his business expand and be able to open another business for his wife in the future.

loans.use: To buy more phone accessories to resell
